title: Thursday Flakes : John Cook Retires , Dani Busboom - Kelly Hired , and Nebrasketballs
body_text:
Here on my famous-as-me recliner of solitude, I’m officially pouring one out for the end of the John Cook era at Nebraska. Man, what a spectacular 25 years it has been with him at the helm of Nebraska volleyball. 4 National Titles, 12 Final Fours and 14 Conference Titles. He’s coached more wins than anyone else in those 25 illustrious years. He’s the man responsible for having the most attended volleyball games per season and all-time. His vision will carry on a legacy throughout the volleyball world. Thanks for everything Coach Cook, you will be sorely missed. Here are your flakes...
Thursday Flakes: John Cook Retires, Dani Busboom-Kelly Hired, and Nebrasketballs
Don’t forget the joke of the week...
NEBRASKA:
Nebraska Volleyball: John Cook Announces Retirement - Corn Nation
Dani Busboom Kelly is named the 4th head coach of Nebraska Volleyball
Dani Busboom Kelly named head coach of Nebraska volleyball | NCAA.com
Former Nebraska volleyball star and Louisville head coach named successor to John Cook.
How to Watch Nebraska Women’s Basketball at Purdue: Preview, Breakdown, TV Channel
The Huskers look to rebound in West Lafayette after seeing their five-game winning streak snapped by No. 12 Ohio State.
How to Watch Nebraska Men’s Basketball vs. No. 17 Illinois: Preview, Breakdown, TV
The Huskers aim to ends their nightmare run of six-straight losses by taking down a ranked Illinois team at home.
“OTHER” FOOTBALL:
Champions League draw: Why Man City can face Bayern, Real Madrid - ESPN
There is going to be a blockbuster Champions League knockout playoff round tie between Manchester City and Bayern Munich or Real Madrid. Here’s why.
UEFA Champions League highlights: Man City advances, Liverpool holds onto top spot | FOX Sports
Here are the live results and standings for Champions League Matchday 8.
Who could Liverpool, Arsenal, Aston Villa, Man City and Celtic face in UEFA Champions League play-offs and last 16? - Eurosport
How does the UEFA Champions League play-off draw work? When is it? Who could British teams face?
ROUNDBALL NEWS:
NBA commissioner Adam Silver raises possibility of league moving to 10-minute quarters - Yahoo Sports
Silver floated the idea of 40-minute NBA games — but did not commit to it — in an interview on Wednesday.
Report: Reggie Miller joining NBC as lead NBA analyst - ESPN
Hall of Famer Reggie Miller will join NBC Sports as its top color commentator when the NBA returns to the network later this year, Front Office Sports reported Wednesday.
Hawks’ Jalen Johnson (shoulder) out for season | NBA.com
Atlanta’s high-flying forward reportedly will miss the rest of 2024-25 because of a left shoulder injury.
PUCK LUCK:
NHL Power Rankings: Jets Force Their Way Into First Place After Canes’ League-Altering Trade - The Hockey News
The Winnipeg Jets lead the NHL power rankings for the first time since November, but it’s tight at the top. Plus, the blockbuster Rantanen trade has another big winner.
Utah hockey team name: What are the final 3 options? – Deseret News
Smith Entertainment Group is conducting a second survey to determine the new name of its NHL franchise.
BAESEBALL:N
“Opportunistic” Cubs Still Hanging Around in a Handful of Pursuits, Including Alex Bregman - Bleacher Nation
The Cubs keep getting mentioned together with Alex Bregman.
MLB The Show 25 cover athletes revealed: Paul Skenes, Elly De La Cruz, and Gunnar Henderson – PlayStation.Blog
3 of the best young stars get their shots on the cover
ENTERTAINMENT:
’Little House on the Prairie’ Series Reboot Set at Netflix
Netflix has greenlit a new TV adaptation of “Little House on the Prairie,” the beloved book series written by Laura Ingalls Wilder.
JOKE OF THE WEEK:
I’m thinking about removing my spine...I feel like it’s only holding me back.
